sect2.title: Ziel des Spiels
sect2.para: Verschieben Sie alle Karten auf die Fundamentstapel.

sect2.title: Regeln
sect2.para: Build on to Foundations in sequence from Ace to King regardless of suit. Cards in Foundations are no longer in play. Cards are dealt singly in to the Waste from the Stock. However, as the Waste pile can only hold one card, this card must immediately be played on to a Foundation pile or on to any of the four Reserve piles. Cards in the Reserve piles cannot be rearranged.

sect2.title: Punktwertung
sect2.para: Jede Karte, die in den Fundamentstapeln abgelegt wird, erzielt einen Punkt.

sect2.title: Strategie
sect2.para: Try not to place cards of higher rank on to cards of lower rank in the Reserve.
